coreAttributes.name: Chocolate Brownie
coreAttributes.description: A small cardboard box containing both a delicious chocolate brownie as well as a small ceramic plate upon which to present it. While a popular snack in general, capybaras have somehow become closely associated with it, although nobody seems to know quite how.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the brownie out of its protective box and quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it, leaving [npc.herHim] with the delicious taste of chocolate filling [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the brownie out of its protective box, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to eat it. Quickly devouring it, [npc2.name] is left with the delicious taste of chocolate filling [npc2.her] mouth.
